name: Docflow

defaultSetting.descriptioin: Note: This setting will serve as the default configuration for each document flow.
defaultSetting.descriptioinSpecific: Note: The settings will only take effect in the current document flow.

scrollMode.title: Scroll Mode
scrollMode.text: Fixed height for a single document, scroll to load its internal content. It can save memory resources when dealing with large documents.

displayBreadcrumb.title: Collapse Bar
displayBreadcrumb.text: Whether to display the breadcrumb for each document target (collapsed/expanded bar).

protyleTitle.title: Display Title
protyleTitle.text: Whether to display the title of the document.

protyleReadonly.title: Read-only Mode
protyleReadonly.text: The body of the document is read-only.

dynamicLoading.title: Dynamic Loading
dynamicLoading.text: Dynamically load documents within the document stream as you scroll up or down. It can save memory resources when dealing with a large number of documents.

dynamicLoadingCapacity.title: Dynamic Loading Capacity
dynamicLoadingCapacity.text: When dynamic loading is enabled, the maximum number of documents to load at a time.

dynamicLoadingShift.title: Dynamic Loading Increment
dynamicLoadingShift.text: When dynamic loading is enabled, the number of documents to load each time when scrolling to the edge (up/down).

editRuleVal.ChildDocument: Please enter a document block ID
editRuleVal.SQL: Please enter an SQL query statement for the block
editRuleVal.IdList: Please enter several block IDs, separated by newline characters
